00046     public function setRequestVar($sName, $sValue = null, $sType = Variable::TYPE_DEFAULT) {
00047         return $this->oRequestVars->set($sName, $sValue, $sType);

00076     public function getRequestByType($sType = Variable::TYPE_DEFAULT) {
00077         $aVariables = $this->oRequestVars->getByType($sType);
00078         $s = '';
00079         foreach ($aVariables as $sName => $sValue) {
00080             $s .= $sName . '=' . urlencode($sValue) . '&';
00081         }
00082         return substr($s, 0, -1);
00083     }
00084 
00095     public function setBody($sBody, $sMimeType = '', $sPath = '', $sName = '') {
00096         if (!empty($sPath)) {
00097             $this->sBodyFileName = $sBody;
00098             $sBody = file_get_contents($sPath . '/' . $sBody);
00099         }
00100         $this->sMimeType = empty($sMimeType) ? $this->getMimeType() : $sMimeType;
00101         $this->sBody = $sBody;
00102         $this->sBodyName = $sName;
00103     }
00104

00112     }

00120         return strlen($this->sBody);
